# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.1.0] - 2026-01-20

### Added
- Initial release of Quantic-Rust.
- High-performance quantum circuit synthesis in Rust.
- Python bindings via PyO3 and maturin.
- Optimization engine with ZX-calculus support.
- Core modules: algorithms, synthesis, optimization, error_correction, variational, cryptography, qml.
- Comprehensive Mermaid diagrams for system architecture.
- Community health files: CODE_OF_CONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING, SECURITY.
